Uses of Package
com.turbomanage.httpclient

Packages that use com.turbomanage.httpclient
com.turbomanage.httpclient Minimal HTTP client wrapping HttpURLConnection. 
com.turbomanage.httpclient.android Minimal HTTP client for Android wrapping HttpURLConnection. 
 

Classes in com.turbomanage.httpclient used by com.turbomanage.httpclient
AbstractHttpClient
          Lightweight HTTP client that facilitates GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests using HttpURLConnection.
AsyncCallback
          Callback passed to an AsyncRequestExecutor so that the calling code can be notified when a request is complete or has thrown an exception.
AsyncHttpClient
          An HTTP client that completes all requests asynchronously using DoHttpRequestTask.
AsyncRequestExecutor
          Describes a class that can execute a request asynchronously.
AsyncRequestExecutorFactory
          Factory that provides an async wrapper for a request, that is, something that can execute a request asynchronously.
HttpMethod
          Enumerated type that represents an HTTP request method.
HttpRequest
          Holds data for an HTTP request to be made with the attached HTTP client.
HttpRequestException
          Custom exception class that holds an HttpResponse.
HttpResponse
          Minimal representation of the raw HTTP response copied from HttpURLConnection.
ParameterMap
          Parameter map knows offers convenience methods for chaining add()s as well as URL encoding.
RequestHandler
          Interface that defines the request lifecycle used by AbstractHttpClient.
RequestLogger
          HTTP request logger used by BasicHttpClient.
 

Classes in com.turbomanage.httpclient used by com.turbomanage.httpclient.android
AbstractHttpClient
          Lightweight HTTP client that facilitates GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests using HttpURLConnection.
AsyncCallback
          Callback passed to an AsyncRequestExecutor so that the calling code can be notified when a request is complete or has thrown an exception.

          An HTTP client that completes all requests asynchronously using DoHttpRequestTask.

          Describes a class that can execute a request asynchronously.

          Factory that provides an async wrapper for a request, that is, something that can execute a request asynchronously.
HttpRequest
          Holds data for an HTTP request to be made with the attached HTTP client.
RequestHandler
          Interface that defines the request lifecycle used by AbstractHttpClient.
